metadata.name: Uncommon FileSystem Load Attempt By Format.com
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of format.com with an uncommon filesystem selection that could indicate a defense evasion activity in which "format.com" is used to load malicious DLL files or other programs.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\format.com')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/fs:')) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/fs:exfat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/fs:fat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/fs:ntfs')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/fs:refs')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/fs:udf'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of format.com with an uncommon filesystem selection that could indicate a defense evasion activity in which "format.com" is used to load malicious DLL files or other programs.
